agent_purpose: Generates creative social media graphic concepts for tech/AI content including visual descriptions, color palettes, typography recommendations, layout structures, platform specifications, and copy suggestions
description: AI Graphics Designer Agent that generates creative social media graphic concepts with visual descriptions, color palettes, typography, layout, platform specs, copy suggestions, and design tips

example_response.visual_description: The graphic features a sleek, modern workspace with a luminous digital brain hologram hovering above a laptop, radiating vibrant, dynamic circuitry patterns. The background is a gradient of deep blues and purples, giving a futuristic night-tech vibe. Minimal geometric shapes and transparent overlays add depth, while subtle neon lines connect icons representing productivity tools (calendar, task list, chat bubbles). The overall mood is energetic, tech-savvy, and inspiring, with a crisp, clean layout to appeal to professionals seeking innovation.

color_palette.name: Pure White
color_palette.usage: Text, hologram highlights, and icon details

typography.style_notes: Headline at 48px, uppercase, high letter-spacing; body at 24px with light line spacing; use semi-bold for key phrases. Ample padding around text elements for clarity.

layout.structure: A symmetrical grid with the laptop and hologram centered, headline above, subheadline below, and icons scattered with connective lines extending left and right. CTA button anchored at the bottom center.
layout.focal_point: The glowing digital brain above the laptop
layout.visual_flow: Eye is drawn first to the hologram, then follows the radiating lines to icons and textual content, ending at the call-to-action button.

copy_suggestions.headline: Unlock AI Productivity
copy_suggestions.subheadline: Revolutionize your workflow with intelligent tools
copy_suggestions.body_text: Discover how AI automates tasks, streamlines collaboration, and maximizes your productivity potential.

design_tips: Use soft glows and gradients on the brain hologram for visual impact
Keep iconography clean and minimal for modern appeal
Ensure text contrast by placing it over semi-transparent dark overlays
